backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing role-based access control with user profiles, meeting logs, and panic events. Includes authorization mixin, CRUD operations with ownership verification, and admin-only functions for role management and panic event retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting logo replacement across landing page, dashboard, PWA manifest, and favicon with high confidence, linked to test REQ-53.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components including routing, hooks, pages, visualizers, and analytics components with details on authentication, state management, and UI features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining color tokens for UI components including sidebar, charts, and semantic colors using OKLCH color space.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template with PWA manifest link, favicon reference to aegis-favicon.dim_32x32.png, and module script entry point for React application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Aegis Sovereign Remote app metadata with standalone display mode, portrait orientation, and icon references to aegis-icon-192 and aegis-icon-512 PNG files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with public and protected routes, GhostModeProvider, panic protocol keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+P), theme provider, and role-based route guards for admin features.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Biomet: Recharts radar chart displaying five biometric metrics (Executive Stress, Vocal Stability, Background Noise, Packet Health, Privacy Score) with live data updates every 4 seconds and active status indicator.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Global: SVG-based world map visualization showing four global nodes (San Francisco, London, Tokyo, Bangalore) with animated pulse effects on random node activation every 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Meetin: Displays a card with meeting details including title, duration, participant count, sentiment score, and cost. Shows an encrypted lock icon and formats duration in minutes and seconds.
Live meeting cost tracker that increments by â‚¹12.5 per second with pause/resume functionality. Displays current cost and rate with an active status indicator.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Neural: Real-time scrolling log display showing simulated security events across categories (ENCRYPT, PACKET, NEURAL, QUANTUM). Generates random log entries every 2-3 seconds and maintains last 50 entries.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Sentim: Live area chart displaying vocal stress and emotional tension metrics over time. Updates every 3 seconds with random data points and maintains a 21-point rolling window.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Speake: Displays a list of speakers with their vocal frequency ranges and activity levels. Activity percentages update every 3 seconds with animated progress bars.
frontend/src/components/analytics/System: Scrolling terminal-style log viewer showing security events across categories (ENCRYPT, SENSORY, AUTH, NETWORK, BIOMETRIC, PACKET). Generates logs every 2-3 seconds and keeps last 50 entries.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to login page. Shows loading spinner during initialization and authentication, wraps children in ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleProtect: Role-based access control component that verifies user permissions (admin or user) and redirects to dashboard if access denied. Shows loading state during permission verification.
frontend/src/components/common/ActiveSta: Small animated green dot indicator with pulsing effect and tooltip showing "Status: Active". Used to indicate live/active state in various components.
frontend/src/components/effects/BorderBe: Animated border effect component that creates a moving gradient beam along the border using CSS animations. Applies a diagonal sweep animation over 8 seconds.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sovereig: 3D rotating orb visualization with radial gradient and glow effects. Shows ripple animations on hover and continuously rotates using CSS 3D transforms.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorBoun: React error boundary component that catches errors in child components and displays a styled error card with options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/components/layout/BentoCard: Reusable card component with glassmorphism styling and optional animated border beam effect for bento-style layouts.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Main dashboard layout component with collapsible sidebar navigation, role-based access control, ghost mode toggle, and user profile display with loading states.
frontend/src/components/MagneticButton.t: Button component with magnetic attraction effect that translates position based on mouse proximity using useMousePosition hook with 0.3 strength multiplier.
frontend/src/components/neural/AIMirrorS: Status indicator component showing whether the AI voice twin (neural proxy) is ready or in standby mode with appropriate icons and messages.
frontend/src/components/neural/NeuralPro: Circular progress indicator with SVG gradient ring displaying synthesis progress percentage for neural processing tasks.
frontend/src/components/neural/VocalDrop: Drag-and-drop file upload component for audio files that validates file types and displays uploaded audio file list with metadata.
frontend/src/components/neural/VoiceHeal: Dashboard displaying voice quality metrics (pitch stability, clarity index, tone quality) with progress bars and gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Environ: Audio environment mixer with volume sliders for eight different ambient sound environments (office, rain, cafe, etc.) for tactical audio masking.
Grid of 16 clickable environment presets that can be activated to spoof background audio with play/stop controls and visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Hardwar: Component that displays fake OS update screens (Windows 11 or macOS) in fullscreen overlay mode for hardware mimicry purposes.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PacketJ: Network degradation simulator with slider control to adjust audio quality, latency, and packet loss, includes Ctrl+Shift+L keyboard shortcut.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PanicPr: Displays a fake Windows 11 update screen as a panic mode overlay with a progress bar and a hidden keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+Q) to dismiss it.
frontend/src/components/sync/ConnectionL: Renders a terminal-style connection log with simulated WebSocket messages that update every 5 seconds, displaying timestamps and color-coded log entries.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Page: Simple wrapper component that applies a fade-in animation to its children for page transitions.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Neura: Canvas-based audio wave visualizer that renders two animated sine waves with different frequencies and colors, including an active status indicator.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Water: Canvas-based waterfall spectrogram that displays scrolling frequency bars with neon green gradient, simulating real-time audio frequency analysis.
frontend/src/contexts/GhostModeContext.t: React context provider that manages ghost mode state with sessionStorage persistence and provides toggle functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, admin token initialization, and automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHapticFeedback.ts: Hook providing haptic feedback functions (light, medium, heavy) using the browser's vibration API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity authentication hook and provider for ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardShortcut.t: Hook that listens for specific keyboard shortcut combinations (including modifier keys) and triggers a callback when all keys are pressed.
frontend/src/hooks/useMousePosition.ts: Hook that tracks mouse position relative to the center of a referenced element, returning x and y coordinates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for ICP backend operations including user profiles, roles, admin checks, meeting logs, and panic event management with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for theming (light/dark modes with color variables for UI components), and includes utility classes and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel page that displays user management interface with a table showing the current user's profile, role, and status; includes notes about requiring backend implementation for full user listing functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsVault.tsx: Analytics vault page that fetches and displays meeting logs in a grid of cards, showing a loading skeleton during fetch or an empty state when no meetings exist.
frontend/src/pages/CommandCenter.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying a comprehensive grid layout of real-time meeting intelligence components including visualizers, analytics widgets, sentiment radar, ROI ticker, and system monitoring tools.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceSync.tsx: Device synchronization page that displays a QR code for mobile pairing and a connection log, enabling users to pair mobile devices for remote control.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, security architecture features, pricing tiers, and social links; includes navigation to login/signup pages.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that provides Internet Identity authentication with a centered card UI, redirecting to dashboard upon successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/NeuralLab.tsx: Neural lab page for vocal cloning and synthesis featuring file upload, progress tracking, voice health dashboard, and AI mirror status with simulated synthesis processing.
frontend/src/pages/SentinelProtocol.tsx: Sentinel Protocol page displaying tactical countermeasures including emergency panic button, environment mixer, environment spoofing, packet jitter simulator, and hardware mimicry components in a bento grid layout with tactical HUD background.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Signup page component that handles user registration via Internet Identity authentication, creates user profile with username, and redirects to dashboard upon successful account creation.
frontend/src/pages/TacticalRemote.tsx: Mobile-optimized tactical remote interface with large touch-friendly buttons for panic mode, lag simulation, and environment spoofing, featuring haptic feedback and toast notifications.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for parameters like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with sidebar/chart colors, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document defining Aegis Sovereign as an enterprise meeting intelligence suite on ICP with architectural notes covering tech stack (React, Motoko, Tailwind), multi-page architecture, glassmorphism design, and extensive feature list including authentication, dashboards, and tactical components.
